metadata.title: CVE-2021-47236 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:cdc_eem: fix tx fixup skb leak when usbnet transmit a skb, eem fixup it ineem_tx_fixup(), if skb_copy_expand() failed, it return NULL,usbnet_start_xmit() will have no chance to free original skb. fix it byfree orginal skb in eem_tx_fixup() first, then check skb clone status, iffailed, return NULL to usbnet.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
